backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with all core CRM, document, NPS, finance, and support data types and imports for authorization, storage, and migrations.
backend/migration.mo: Contains legacy type definitions and migration utilities for converting or updating stored data structures between versions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their responsibilities and recent architectural changes.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app, setting metadata, and including Google Fonts.

frontend/src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx: Desktop sidebar navigation with internal and portal sections, highlighting active routes.

frontend/src/app/router/routeTree.tsx: Empty file placeholder for route tree configuration.

frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines app roles, their permissions, and helper functions to read access flags.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo with a text fallback if the image fails to load.

frontend/src/data/mock/mockClient.ts: Empty placeholder file for a mock data client.
frontend/src/data/mock/seed.ts: Empty placeholder file intended for mock data seeding.

frontend/src/i18n/strings.ptBR.ts: Defines centralized Brazilian Portuguese UI strings for actions, errors, success messages, navigation, and pipeline labels.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, custom color tokens, dark mode variables, utility classes, and Sonner toast layout tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/org/OrgProvider.tsx: Provides context for current organization selection, loading it from the backend profile and exposing selection state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CreateOrganizati: UI page to create a new organization, call backend creation, update selection, and redirect after success.

frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Pip: UI component rendering a kanban pipeline column with card listing, drag-and-drop, rename/delete dialogs, and movement controls.

Reports interface for generating, downloading, viewing history, and scheduling automated sales, finance, and other reports.

frontend/src/pages/internal/SettingsPage: Renders a multi‑tab settings page with organization info, preferences, and team management components.
frontend/src/pages/portal/DeliverablesPa: Displays project deliverables grouped by status with tabs, using queries and a fallback when no project is selected.

frontend/src/types/kanbanCards.ts: Type definitions for Kanban cards, including custom fields, card input, and update structures.
frontend/src/types/model.ts: Comprehensive shared model types for organizations, users, CRM entities, projects, activities, and more.
frontend/src/types/pipelineStages.ts: Type definitions for pipeline stages (Kanban columns) and their reorder update payload.
frontend/src/types/reports.ts: Type definitions for reports, schedules, filters, and report generation inputs.
